TextAsset.value: If you INSIST on joining me at Band Club…
I’ll have to show you where it is. They hold it in the auditorium.
You probably don’t even know where that is yet!
Poor little new kid. Don’t worry, I’ll show you around!
I know where it is! I had to go through it to roll up all that equipment on my katamari.
${slot:playerName}, when a cute and popular girl is saying she’ll show you around…
You don’t turn it down!
(I might think Donko is full of herself…
But she actually is super adorable.)
Now ${slot:playerName}…
I totally know what you’re thinking.
WHAT?! You do?!
Yeah! You’re thinking…
“Why is the most popular student at Namco High in a dorky club like Band?!”
Well… the truth is… I just like it, okay?!
And besides, I’m so cute and popular, I can actually pull off dorky stuff once in a while.
Now YOU being in Band, on the other hand…
Poor ${slot:playerName}! Who knows if your reputation will ever recover!
Band isn’t THAT dorky, is it?
Tee-hee! You poor lost little lamb.
You really don’t know anything about what’s cool and uncool, do you?
Don’t worry! I’ll sort you out.
Besides… do you really expect people to be surprised that, um…
Someone like YOU is in Band?
What…
What’s THAT supposed to mean?!
Nothing!
Nevermind!
(Omigosh, was that totally offensive of me?!)
Don’t be weird, ${slot:playerName}!
Weird kids are NEVER popular!
Okay… here we are.
Hiiii, Aki!
We’re not late, are we?
I brought a new recruit!
Hi Donko!
I love what you’ve been doing with your hair lately.
Oh wait- you don’t have any!
(That’s pretty rude...)
Oh girl! At least I don’t have a horrible dye job like you!
I heard Wada-Don dumped you again! I’m so sorry! Not that anyone is surprised…
(YIKES!)
Oh, it was mutual. We’re still buds!
But it’s not your fault you don’t understand- you’ve only dated LOSERS after all!!!
Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Oh, you’re so FUNNY!
No way, YOU’RE so funny!
(Is this what they call… Frenemies?!)
I can’t stay too long today.
Very busy with homework.
Would it be acceptable if I performed my solo now, to get it out of the way?
Go ahead, girl! Do what you gotta do!
(Aki’s taking out her instrument… a tuba?!
It’s huge… I would’ve expected something small and classy, like a violin…)
Ahem!
(Whoah! She’s playing the tuba…
As fast as she possibly can?!
Performing an entire solo in…
Less than a second?
How is it possible…
She really IS good at everything…)
...Finished. Thank you.
Woo! That was awesome!
Take a bow, girl!
No time for bowing, I’m afraid.
I’ve got too much to attend to.
${slot:playerName}, why don’t you take over on the tuba for me?
Thanks! Donko, lovely to see you!
Ciao!
She just left… with the tuba in my hands…
How am I supposed to follow an amazing solo like that?!
I’ve never even so much as rolled up a tuba with my katamari before…
Relax, honey.
Everybody starts somewhere!
You’ll do great!
Even if it sounds bad…
That’s how it’s supposed to sound, if you’re just starting!
So just have fun with it, kay~?
(Donko’s hand…
Paw?
Drum-foot?
Anyway, it’s on my shoulder…
To reassure me…
It feels really warm..?????
It’s nice, but… why is a drum-foot warm?)
Alright! Let’s get started!
(With that, Donko pulls out… well, a big drum.
I’m not surprised.
To be honest, I wouldn’t have thought a drum could sound beautiful…
But as Donko begins to play it, I realize it can, and it does.
The beats perfectly in rhythm, loose and fast…
And then, suddenly building to a thunderous, passionate roar.
I can barely make any sound come out of this tuba…
I wish I could be as good at this… at ANYTHING… as Donko is on that drum.
But Donko keeps glancing over and smiling in my direction-
As though I’m doing a great job.
It almost makes me believe that I am.
Everyone else in Band has stopped what they’re doing to listen, too…
Donko is the obvious star of the club.)
Phew! Good job, everyone~!
You all sounded great! Miranda, your violin was TOTES AMAZING!
And Del, remember last week you were worried about your piano?
Such an improvement this time! I’m serious!
(She’s so… gracious?! That DOES surprise me.)
I’m so glad you all can live up to my awesome example! Tee-hee!
(...Well, almost gracious.)
As for YOU, honey!
Wha? Me?!
If that was REALLY your first time on the tuba…
I’m like, seriously way impressed!
I told you- you’ve got potential!
Oh! Gosh! But I didn’t-
I mean, haha-
It was… nothing…
Oh, look... Everybody else is here too...
Huh? More kids from detention?
Are they all in Band, too?
Uh, no, not really… they’re here because of-
Wow, Donko!
That was SO GREAT!
If I were marching off to battle, I’d want you to beat the drums of war beside me!
Oh Blue Max, you are SUCH the sweetest!
Keep rockin’ the vintage look, ‘kay?
YES VERY GOOD
GALAGA APPRECIATES TRUE TALENT
Heehee… Coming from you…
That means, like, sooo much!
Nice playing.
Thanks girl! Love your whole “still waters run deep” vibe!
(Wow… So many people came to enjoy Donko’s music!
It looks like she’s really soaking up all the adoration, haha.
Well, I guess when you’re that talented, you should be able to enjoy the rewards!)
(Wait… Just for a second there…
When nobody was talking to her…
Donko looked kind of sad.
I wonder what’s up?)
Thanks for coming by to listen, y’all!
XOXO!
Hey Donko…
Can we talk outside for a minute?
Yeah…
That would actually be super nice.
For a moment there…
Maybe I’m crazy, but you seemed kinda down.
What’s going on?
I thought you’d be the kinda person who’d love attention like that.
Hee hee…
You always say what’s on your mind, don’t you?
You’re honest… or maybe you just have no tact!
Either way…
If I ask you something…
You’ll tell me the truth, won’t you?
S-sure…
Everyone tells me I’m really good at the drum.
But… people always seem to tell me…
that I’m really good at EVERYTHING…
Because I’m so cute, and they want to be my friend.
(I’m a bit taken aback by this bragging…
But it seems Donko is being honest and sincere.
I guess… it’s easy to see that her cuteness and popularity are real.
So why shouldn’t she acknowledge that?
There’s nothing wrong with that, I guess.)
Because of that…
I can’t really tell if I’m ACTUALLY any good at drumming…
Or if people are just saying that so they can be my friend.
But I want to really be good at it!
I want that really, really badly…
(She’s looking right at me without blinking…
Eyes shining with courage…
Donko…)
So please, ${slot:playerName}!
Tell me the truth, so I can know for sure…
Am I really any good at playing the drum?
Or…
Are they all just telling me what I want to hear?
(Donko is showing me her heart right now…
I have to answer truthfully and not play around.)
Honestly…
You are really very good!
I loved hearing you play.
WAAAHHHHHHHHH!
Augh, you must have misheard me!
I said you’re GOOD! I swear!
Sniff… No no, silly, it’s happy tears…
BWAAAAAHHH!!
U-um…
There, there?
(I guess I should pat her back in sympathy…
Which part is her back, though? She’s kinda… cylindrical…
So isn’t her back also part of her stomach?
...I’ll play it safe and pat her face instead.)
Th-thank you…
I know you wouldn’t lie to me…
It’s, like, such a relief to hear that…
Well, it’s the truth!
If you sucked, I would just…
Try to find a way to politely avoid answering you, haha.
SNIFF…
Hoooooo!
Shake it off, shake it off…
Okay, I’m done.
Now listen up! If you ever tell anyone you saw me crying my eyes out…
I’ll ruin your reputation at this school before you can say “Gene Krupa”!
Haha, okay, okay.
You know, to tell the truth…
I’m a little jealous of your talent!
There’s nothing that I’m really good at like that.
But, like, it’s not “talent”!
I’ve worked, like, TOTALLY hard to try to be good.
You could do the same thing and get as good as me!
Yeah yeah, I know…
But honestly, I wouldn’t even mind if people told me I was good, just because they wanted me to like them.
I can see why you might be worried about that, but me…
I don’t really have many friends here. I’m not popular, like you are.
NO!
Being cute and cool and popular is something ANYBODY can do!
It’s just like music-
You only have to work at it!
Well, that’s easy for YOU to say.
No! Shush!
You shush now!
Drumroll, please….
I’ve just had, like, the absolute BEST idea EVER!
If I tell you now, it’ll like, spoil the surprise!
You stay right here and don’t do ANYTHING until I come back!
Capische?!
What…
Literally just stay sitting right here?
Okay, I guess…
Okay, it’s too exciting! I can’t hold it in!
${slot:playerName}, it’s totes your lucky day!
I, Donko, the most popular student Namco High has EVER had…
Am going to take YOU, the cute new kid, under my wing!
With my help, you’re going to be just as popular as me!
And then you’ll see that ANYBODY can do it!
That’s very nice of you, but I’m not sure I-
Shh! Don’t question it, silly!
You’ll thank me in the end!
Okay, bye honey!
I’ve got a ton of planning to do!
See you tomorrow!
(Heh…
Donko is SO confident, she just does whatever she likes without thinking.
But… I can see that she really does think about other people, too.
She’s not just self-centered and vain…
Okay, she’s ALSO those things, but not JUST that…
There’s a good heart in that drum somewhere.
Donko is a little over-the-top…
But she’s definitely popular and well-liked for a reason.
I’m starting to like Donko a lot, too.)
